title: File Splitting - Module Reorganization
description: Split 8 oversized files (>400 lines) into focused modules while maintaining existing patterns and adding ESLint exemptions for templates
implementation: Identify logical boundaries in each oversized file
Extract cohesive modules (e.g., init.ts → init-detector.ts, init-generator.ts, init-validator.ts)
Add ESLint exemptions for template files (if needed)
Run tests after each file split
Update import paths in dependent files
acceptanceCriteria: Each new module is cohesive and focused
Template files have appropriate ESLint exemptions
